notes.setup: MCP servers require Docker services running. Start with: docker compose -f config/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
notes.n8n_api_key: Generate in n8n UI: Settings → API → Create API Key, then set N8N_API_KEY env var
notes.github: Requires GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable for authenticated access
notes.n8n_mcp: n8n-mcp allows AI to build workflows. netsurf-mcp exposes business tools via n8n's native MCP Server Trigger node
notes.n8n_mcp_hosted: Alternative: Use hosted service at https://dashboard.n8n-mcp.com for zero-config (100 calls/day free)
